name: Protegee
headline: Payments API for AI Agents
description:
We’re excited to launch our first product that allows your AI voice agents to accept payments easily and securely over the phone. We manage compliance, security, and fraud, letting you focus on creating great experiences.  

We are setting the stage for the agentic economy, starting with voice payments. Web and agent-to-agent transactions coming soon.

founders.name: Kirthi Banothu, Founder
founders.description: Got into building things back in 2006 with a website for Dragon Ball Z content. Ex-HFT (Optiver + DRW), built low-latency trading systems a few too many times - developed strategies for futures, cryptos, equities, and options. Had a stint in self-driving leading the onboard sensor and ml libraries team at Argo AI. Skipped half as many grades as my cofounder.

founders.name: Xiaoyu Li, Founder
founders.description:
Enabling AI agents to make + accept payments safely. 

Ex-quant trader at Optiver specializing in index + equity options market-making. Started and grew a medium-frequency algorithmic trading team. Yale Medical School dropout. Skipped twice as my grades as my cofounder.

![Y Combinator](http://protegee.ai/assets/images/yc-long.png)
## Turn Your AI Voice Agents into Revenue Centers
Stop leaving money on the table. Let your AI voice agents handle payments directly, turning every conversation into a potential transaction. It's as simple as one API call. 
![](https://cdn.easyfrontend.com/pictures/hero/hero-6.png)
## Built for AI-First Companies
Whether you're using Retell, VAPI, Twilio, or any other voice AI platform, we make it dead simple to add secure payment processing. One integration, endless possibilities. 
![](https://cdn.easyfrontend.com/pictures/cards-1.png)
![](http://protegee.ai/assets/images/why-us.jpg)
#### PCI DSS Compliant
Our platform adheres to the highest security standards, ensuring your customers' data is protected and compliant with PCI DSS regulations. [Learn more](http://protegee.ai/<https:/trust.protegee.ai/>)
#### Easy Integration
Integrate our payment processing capabilities with your existing AI voice platforms effortlessly. Our APIs are designed for quick and seamless integration. 
#### AI Native
Our platform is built with AI in mind, providing native support for AI voice agents to handle payments securely and efficiently. 
#### Unlock Revenue Generation
Enable your AI voice agents to generate revenue by accepting payments over the phone. Our platform supports various payment processors, ensuring flexibility and scalability. 
## Ready to plug into your favorite AI platforms
![](http://protegee.ai/assets/images/retell-logo.png) ![](http://protegee.ai/assets/images/vapi-logo.png) ![](http://protegee.ai/assets/images/bland-logo.jpeg) ![](http://protegee.ai/assets/images/twilio-logo.png)
## Connect to payment providers you already trust
![](http://protegee.ai/assets/images/authorizenet-logo.png) ![](http://protegee.ai/assets/images/stripe.svg) ![](http://protegee.ai/assets/images/vgs-logo.svg) ![](http://protegee.ai/assets/images/adyen-logo.png) ![](http://protegee.ai/assets/images/fiserv-logo.png) ![](http://protegee.ai/assets/images/worldpay-logo.png)
# Companies Like Yours Are Already Winning
From call centers to healthcare, organizations are using Protegee AI to unlock new revenue streams. Here's what they're building: 
![](https://cdn.easyfrontend.com/pictures/blog/blog_9.jpg)
1
##### AI-Powered Call Centers
Stop routing customers to human agents for payments. Our customers are seeing faster resolution times and higher conversion rates with AI-handled payments. 
2
##### Restaurants & Hospitality
Take reservations and orders 24/7 with instant payment processing. Your AI can now handle everything from deposits to full payments, completely autonomously. 
3
##### Travel & Transportation
Let passengers handle bookings, changes, and upgrades instantly. No more callbacks or manual payment processing - just seamless, automated transactions. 
4
##### Non-Profit & Fundraising
Convert every call into potential donations. When disaster strikes, your AI fundraisers can accept contributions round-the-clock, maximizing your impact. 
5
##### Utilities & Services
Automate bill payments and service changes with confidence. Our customers are reducing payment processing costs by 60% while improving satisfaction scores. 
6
##### Specialized AI Agents
From legal consultations to healthcare scheduling, monetize your vertical AI solution instantly. If your AI can sell it, we can help you collect payment for it. 
## Frequently Asked Questions
Have questions about our platform? Here are some of the most common questions we receive. 
[ What is Protegee AI? ](http://protegee.ai/<#ezy-faq12-collapse-1>)
Protegee AI is a platform that enables AI voice agents to securely process credit card payments over the phone. Our solution is designed to integrate seamlessly with your existing voice platforms. 
[ How secure is Protegee AI? ](http://protegee.ai/<#ezy-faq12-collapse-2>)
Security is our top priority. Protegee AI is PCI DSS compliant, ensuring that all payment data is handled with the highest level of security. We use advanced encryption and security protocols to protect your customers' information. 
[ Which payment processors do you support? ](http://protegee.ai/<#ezy-faq12-collapse-3>)
We support a wide range of payment processors, including Stripe, Authorize.net, Adyen, Fiserv, Worldpay, and more. Our platform is designed to be flexible and scalable, allowing you to connect with multiple payment processors as needed. 
[ How easy is it to integrate Protegee AI with my existing voice platform? ](http://protegee.ai/<#ezy-faq12-collapse-4>)
Integrating Protegee AI with your existing voice platform is straightforward. Our APIs are designed for quick and seamless integration, allowing you to get up and running in no time. We also provide comprehensive documentation and support to assist you throughout the process. 
[ Can I schedule a demo to see Protegee AI in action? ](http://protegee.ai/<#ezy-faq12-collapse-5>)
Absolutely! We encourage you to schedule a demo to see how Protegee AI can transform your AI voice agents into revenue-generating tools. Click the "Schedule a Demo" button to find a time that works for you. 
# Ready to Transform Your AI Voice Agents?
Join the companies that are already processing payments over the phone. Schedule a demo to see how simple it is to get started.
© 2025 Protegee, Inc
[ ](http://protegee.ai/</>)

  * [ToS](http://protegee.ai/</terms-of-service>)

generated_description:
**Company Summary: Protegee**

Founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator's Batch F24, Protegee is a San Francisco-based startup working at the intersection of artificial intelligence and fintech. With a lean team of just two employees, they are focused on revolutionizing payment processing for AI voice agents. Their mission? To enable these agents to handle payments seamlessly and securely over the phone, creating a new revenue stream for businesses in various sectors.

Protegee’s first product is a Payments API that simplifies the payment process for AI voice agents. Thanks to this API, conversations can transform into transactions with just one call—giving organizations the ability to monetize interactions without overwhelming human agents. They take care of compliance and security, which means you can concentrate on the user experience. Think of them as the backbone of the agentic economy, starting with voice payments, and soon expanding into web and agent-to-agent transactions.

The platform boasts several key features:
- **Easy Integration:** A seamless setup with existing AI voice platforms like Twilio, Retell, and VAPI.
- **Security Compliance:** Protegee is fully PCI DSS compliant, ensuring top-level security for all payment data.
- **AI-First Design:** Entirely built for AI, their technology allows voice agents to operate efficiently while handling payments.
- **Flexible Payment Support:** Compatibility with multiple payment processors ensures that businesses can choose the solution that fits them best.

Protegee is already collaborating with a variety of sectors—from healthcare and call centers to hospitality and non-profits—helping them leverage AI to reduce costs and improve payment efficiency. Their platform aims to turn every customer interaction into a potential revenue-generating event.

For business owners who want to ensure they aren’t leaving money on the table, Protegee provides the tools to transform AI voice agents into effective revenue centers. They invite interested parties to schedule a demo and experience the ease of integrating their payment solutions.

You can find out more about Protegee on their website: [http://protegee.ai](http://protegee.ai).

In summary, if you’re in the business of leveraging AI for customer interactions, Protegee stands out as a promising partner to help you unlock the full potential of your voice agents while enhancing revenue capabilities.
